title: Valkyrie: The Vampire Princess
description: Synopsis  Valkyrie is a young man who grew up only with the education of his mother.A woman who suffered much in life to be pregnant without knowing the true origin of the father of her daughter.She grew up having strange dreams with a man who never saw in your life.Eros when he meets a handsome and attractive, the mystery becomes part of everyday life.On certain nights, she sleeps with an owl watching her sleep.Surprising revelations come over the day, changing her life forever ...
author: Pet Torres
